movie.title: Blood Is Blood
movie.description_intro: A young girl seeks revenge after an unexpected death, while the world around her unravels revealing horrifying secrets about her life and family.
movie.description_full: A young girl seeks revenge after an unexpected death, while the world around her unravels revealing horrifying secrets about her life and family.

movies.title: Devil's Tower
movies.summary: Sarah (Roxanne Pallett) has just moved into a block of flats to start a new life away from her abusive mother. There, she strikes up an unconventional friendship with squatter Sid (Jason Mewes). When Sid's friend Paul goes missing, he and Sarah unearth a series of strange deaths and disappearances. Watched by a malevolent spirit controlling the building's televisions and cameras, reality and fantasy merge as events are twisted into a sick movie on a TV set high in the block of flats. Sid and Sarah are thrown into a fight for survival when the vengeful ghost controlling a horde of zombies possesses Sarah's mother (Frances Ruffelle). Evil suddenly has a familiar face.

movies.title: A Dark Path
movies.summary: Two girls in Eastern Europe on their way home from a hen party in a car with no GPS signal headed for a very unusual forest local people will not venture into this forest

movies.title: Book of Blood
movies.summary: A paranormal expert discovers a house that is at the intersection of so-called "highways" transporting souls in the afterlife.
movies.description_full: A paranormal expert discovers a house that is at the intersection of so-called "highways" transporting souls in the afterlife.
movies.synopsis: A paranormal expert discovers a house that is at the intersection of so-called "highways" transporting souls in the afterlife.

movies.title: Ghost Money
movies.summary: It's a belief that the coins which are put into a dead man's mouth will be used in their next life. When that money is stolen, the dead will get it back and the thieves will face consequences from beyond the grave.
movies.description_full: It's a belief that the coins which are put into a dead man's mouth will be used in their next life. When that money is stolen, the dead will get it back and the thieves will face consequences from beyond the grave.
